The Penn State womens track team capped off its season to remember in the backwoods of Arkansas PERIOD The competition at the NCAA Indoor Championships wasnt just the Judds and the Joads and the Clintons in Fayetteville but the cream of the collegiate track and field crop PERIOD

The Nittany Lions nabbed four AllAmerican honors and a thirteenth place finish as a team its highest finish ever PERIOD

Senior Connie Moore the queen of Penn State track and field is now in the international spotlight by posting the third best time in the 200meters in the world PERIOD The dash time of . seconds is obviously a new Penn State school record PERIOD In that very race the fastest women on the planet in the 200meters finished one two three  earning Moore one of two AllAmerican honors from the meet PERIOD Moore also placed sixth in the 60meters for an additional AllAmerican title PERIOD Already the most decorated athlete in Penn State track and field history Moore now owns a mindboggling nine AllAmerican titles PERIOD

Womens Track  Field Penn State finished thirteenth with  points at the NCAA championships PERIOD

 Penn State womens track coach Beth AlfordSullivan said PERIOD

Another Penn State record fell on Saturday this time on the field PERIOD Senior JaNai OConnor already the Big Ten champion in the shot put finished fifth overall with a throw of  feet   inches PERIOD The mark earned OConnor her first ever AllAmerican honors and bested her Big Ten mark by more than a foot PERIOD

Chi Chi Aduba was the final Nittany Lion to finish the NCAA Indoor Championship with AllAmerican honors this year PERIOD In the triple jump Aduba finished in seventh place a little bit behind her fourth place finish of only on year ago PERIOD Aduba finishes off an equally stellar career as the second most decorated jumper in the history of Penn State womens track and field PERIOD The only other Lion competing in the championships was senior Sara Dougherty in the polevault PERIOD Though she finished fifteenth the honor for Dougherty was being among the greatest of the collegiate ranks PERIOD

 AlfordSullivan said expressing the thoughts of the whole coaching staff PERIOD 

AlfordSullivan was named MidAtlantic Coach of the Year after nabbing the first Big Ten title in program history PERIOD Currently in Dallas Texas meeting with fellow U.S PERIOD Olympic Team coaches she now has the daunting task of getting the team ready for the outdoor track season PERIOD
